org.chronos.chronodb.api

Interface StatisticsManager


  • public interface StatisticsManager
    The StatisticsManager is the entry point to all statistic-related capabilities in the public API.

    The primary purpose of this class is to produce statistic report objects.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      BranchHeadStatistics calculateBranchHeadStatistics(java.lang.String branchName)
      Returns the statistics for the "head portion" of the given branch.
      ChronoDBStatistics calculateGlobalStatistics()
      Calculates and returns the global statistics for this ChronoDB instance.

    • Method Detail

      • calculateGlobalStatistics

        ChronoDBStatistics calculateGlobalStatistics()
        Calculates and returns the global statistics for this ChronoDB instance.

        Please note that running this method can potentially take a while. The returned object is immutable. Every invocation of this method will produce a new, independent statistics object.

        Returns:
        The global statistics. Never null.

      • calculateBranchHeadStatistics

        BranchHeadStatistics calculateBranchHeadStatistics(java.lang.String branchName)
        Returns the statistics for the "head portion" of the given branch.

        The definition of what the "head portion" is, is up to the backend at hand. In general, it refers to the more recent history.

        Parameters:
        branchName - The name of the branch to retrieve the statistics for. Must not be null, must refer to an existing branch.
        Returns:
        The statistics. Never null.
